00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/icu>
00028 #include <l4/sys/vcon.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00030 
00031 namespace L4 {
00032 
00041 class Vcon :
00042   public Kobject_t<Vcon, Icu, L4_PROTO_LOG>
00043 {
00044   L4_KOBJECT(Vcon)
00045 
00046 public:
00051   l4_msgtag_t
00052   send(char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00053   { return l4_vcon_send_u(cap(), buf, size, utcb); }
00054 
00059   long
00060   write(char const *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00061   { return l4_vcon_write_u(cap(), buf, size, utcb); }
00062 
00067   int
00068   read(char *buf, int size, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00069   { return l4_vcon_read_u(cap(), buf, size, utcb); }
00070 
00075   l4_msgtag_t
00076   set_attr(l4_vcon_attr_t const *attr, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00077   { return l4_vcon_set_attr_u(cap(), attr, utcb); }
00078 
00083   l4_msgtag_t
00084   get_attr(l4_vcon_attr_t *attr, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00085   { return l4_vcon_get_attr_u(cap(), attr, utcb); }
00086 };
00087 
00088 }
